definition: A term used to describe someone who displays an excessive sense of superiority or self-importance, often resulting in condescending behavior towards others. This word is commonly employed to characterize individuals who exhibit an inflated ego and a dismissive attitude towards those they perceive as inferior.

examples.german: Er verhält sich immer sehr arrogant.
Sie wirkt oft arrogant, obwohl sie es nicht ist.
examples.english: She often appears arrogant, even though she isn't.

examples.german: Seine arrogante Haltung hat ihn viele Freunde gekostet.
examples.english: His arrogant attitude has cost him many friends.
